advisory.name: RLBA-2021:4397

advisory.topic: An update for logwatch is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation
Enterprise Linux 8.5 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: Logwatch lists sieve "stored mail into mailbox" entries as unmatched
